text: Michael David Herr (April 13, 1940 – June 23, 2016) was an American writer and war correspondent. He was known as the author of Dispatches (1977). He was a correspondent for Esquire magazine (1967–1969) during the Vietnam War. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American war correspondents Category:American political writers Category:American autobiographers Category:American screenwriters Category:Writers from Kentucky
title: Michael Herr
